item.description:
Hello Canucks,

Well it's almost December and that must mean one thing... time for our Annual Christmas party. We'll be going to Kings once again this year for some Pool and Bowling. We'll meet in the bar area and then get the games going. This year the Kiwi's, Aussies and Brits will be joining to make it a Commonwealth party!

Hope you can make it.

Andrew

..

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: 5th Annual Commonwealth Expat Holiday Party
